channel.title: memo on Pitch by Shun Kakinoki
channel.description: Recent content in memo on Pitch by Shun Kakinoki

item.title: Memo Efficiency Hardware
item.description: Memo Efficiency Hardware Mission Open the possibility of memos through dedicated software Problem Analog-like experience for memos are much needed Digital memos often hinder productivity Democratize efficient memo-taking Solution Proprietary solution for digital + analog memo taking Memo taking redefined through paper-like hardware with syncing capability Productivity-first memo solution
item.content:encoded: Memo Efficiency Hardware Mission Open the possibility of memos through dedicated software Problem Analog-like experience for memos are much needed Digital memos often hinder productivity Democratize efficient memo-taking Solution Proprietary solution for digital + analog memo taking Memo taking redefined through paper-like hardware with syncing capability Productivity-first memo solution
